org.akubraproject.impl
Class StreamManager

java.lang.Object
  org.akubraproject.impl.StreamManager

public class StreamManager
extends Object

Utility class that tracks the open streams of a BlobStore. This also provides for ensuring that streams that belong to a BlobStoreConnection are closed when the connection is closed.

Author:
Chris Wilper

Field Summary
protected  CloseListener listener
          Listens to close events.

Method Detail

manageOutputStream

public OutputStream manageOutputStream(BlobStoreConnection con,
                                       OutputStream stream)
                                throws IOException
Provides a tracked wrapper around a given OutputStream.

Parameters:
con - the connection that the returned output-stream belongs to.
stream - the stream to wrap.
Returns:
the wrapped version of the stream.
Throws:
IOException - if interrupted while trying to acquire the state-lock

manageInputStream

public InputStream manageInputStream(BlobStoreConnection con,
                                     InputStream stream)
                              throws IOException
Provides a tracked wrapper around a given InputStream.

Parameters:
con - the connection that the returned input-stream belongs to.
stream - the stream to wrap.
Returns:
the wrapped version of the stream.
Throws:
IOException - if interrupted while trying to acquire the state-lock

connectionClosed

public void connectionClosed(BlobStoreConnection con)
Notification that a connection is closed. All its open streams are closed.

Parameters:
con - the connection that is closed
